thread.section_title: Clubhouse Golf Reviews | Read Customer Service Reviews of www.clubhousegolf.co.uk
thread.title: Alun Shepherd
thread.title_full: Clubhouse Golf reviewed by Alun Shepherd

author: Alun Shepherd
title: Alun Shepherd
text: Just starting using Clubhouse Golf for my golf equipment. Ordered 3 items and 2 were out of stock. i was kept updated when the items would be in stock and dispatch confirmation. Excellent customer service with updated communication. Would defiantly buy from Clubhouse again.
